name: Rerbal Space Program
description:
Design a roguish rocket and try to get into space!

A web-based 2D rocket-launch simulator with these amazing features:

  • Very short, single player gameplay
  • Random winds
  • Permadeath - Start over after destruction
  • Turn-based (to appease the RL Berliners)
  • Resources to manage (fuel, command point)
  • Lots of Numbers
  • Keyboard controls
  • Less functionality than the KSP1 Alpha
  • Worse framerate than the KSP2 EA launch
